title: Escapists: The Walking Dead (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_escapists_the_walking_dead_2.0.0.1.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: ESCAPISTS: THE WALKING DEAD, THE
Genre: Action - Adventure - Stealth
Works on: Windows (Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.8) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17)
Languages: Text only: Deutsch, English, espaÃ±ol, franÃ§ais, Ñ€ÑƒÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹
Modes: Single-player
Released: September 30, 2015
Size: 320.9 MB
Company: Team17 Digital / Team17 Digital
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/escapists_the_walking_dead_the

About:
Merging the smash hit indie game The Escapists with the world wide phenomenon that is The Walking Dead, Team17 have taken the very best of both worlds and are now providing players with the opportunity to play Rick Grimes as he takes on hordes of walkers let loose upon the world.
Rick is in charge of a band of survivors featuring many of the original comic book cast, including Maggie, Hershel, Glenn and Michonne. Rick must secure the safety of the group by seeking out a safe escape route from each area, and manage several dangerous tasks to keep as many of the group alive as possible. The game faithfully matches the timeline of the comics, meaning Rick must first fight his way out of the Harrison Memorial Hospital, visit the Greene family farm before visiting destinations such as the Meriwether Correctional Facility and Woodbury.
5 Locations: Tackle 5 of the most infamous locations from The Walking Dead story including: Meriwether County Correctional Facility, Woodbury, and Alexandria
Epic Crafting: Choose from over two hundred + different items to make over 70 tools or weapons to aid your survival.
Guns!: Firearms will now be available to craft or discover - they are handy for keeping walkers at bay!

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.5 gHz
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series
DirectX: Version 10
Hard Drive: 1 GB available space
Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
Mouse, Keyboard
